faqs.q: How many calories in 100 g black lentils?
faqs.a: About 116 kcal for cooked black lentils.

faqs.q: What is the protein content in black lentils?
faqs.a: Approximately 9 g protein per 100 g cooked.

faqs.q: Are black lentils high in fiber?
faqs.a: Yes, ~8 g dietary fiber per 100 g cooked.

faqs.q: Do black lentils have fat or cholesterol?
faqs.a: Very low fat (0.4 g) and 0 mg cholesterol per 100 g.

faqs.q: How do cooking methods affect calories in black lentils?
faqs.a: Boiling keeps calories low; frying or adding oil increases them significantly.
